FuncDef: This command enters the context to configure LSP BFD for a set of LDP LSPs with FECs matching those defined in the specified prefix list.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the prefix list configured using the config>router>policy-options>prefix-list name command, up to 32 characters maximum. The prefix list name can be specified by the lsp-bfd command prior to the prefix list being defined in the config>router>policy-options context.
